title: DSM-Firmenich Boosts Charlotte Kool’s Sprint Train with Rachele Barbieri
content:
The team also adds British Abi Smith and Josie Nelson to the team, making it the biggest roster for the squad with 18 riders.

Read the full article at DSM-Firmenich Boosts Charlotte Kool’s Sprint Train with Rachele Barbieri on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
